content.question: Which of the following best explains Kollontaiâ€™s purpose in making the argument in the passage?

choices.label: Kollontai wished to reinforce traditional gender roles, which were threatened by the Bolshevik regime.
Kollontai wanted to warn of the threat that the Bolshevik regime presented to the social order.
Kollontai hoped to transform the role of women in Russian society under the Bolshevik regime.
Kollontai desired to make women the leaders of the new Bolshevik regime after the Russian Revolution.

content.answer: Kollontai hoped to transform the role of women in Russian society under the Bolshevik regime.
